name: -webkit-animation-play-state
description: Determines whether the animation is running or paused.
longDescription: A running animation can be paused by setting this property to paused. Set this property to running to continue running a paused animation. A paused animation continues to display the current value of the animation in a static state. When a paused animation is resumed, it restarts from the current value, not from the beginning of the animation.
